overview: O Nosso Homem (Our Man)  is a short variation in the line of the trilogy Pedro Costa has devoted to the habitants of the Fontainhas quarter, which has been destroyed in the meantime. It can be considered as a sort of appendix to the third part,  Juventude en Marcha (Colossal Youth),  in which the hero, Ventura, reappears as one of the four characters of this dialogue of hopelessness.
title: Our Man
